Foundation Portal

The Foundation Portal serves administrators of research foundations, funding organizations, and philanthropic institutions. It provides comprehensive tools for campaign management, donation tracking, and grant administration.

Dashboard Overviewâ€‹

The foundation dashboard displays:

  • Funding Metrics - Total raised, active campaigns, donors
  • Campaign Overview - Status of ongoing fundraising campaigns
  • Recent Donations - Latest contribution activity
  • Upcoming Activities - Scheduled events and deadlines
  • Grant Opportunities - Open funding opportunities
  • Quick Actions - Common tasks and shortcuts

Key Metrics Cardsâ€‹

MetricDescription
Total RaisedSum of all completed donations
Active CampaignsCurrently running campaigns
Total DonorsUnique donor count
Grant OpportunitiesAvailable funding opportunities

Creating Campaignsâ€‹

Set up campaigns with:

  1. Basic Information

    • Campaign name
    • Category selection
    • Description

  2. Funding Goals

    • Target amount
    • Minimum goal
    • Stretch goals

  3. Timeline

    • Start date
    • End date
    • Key milestones

  4. Campaign Status

    • Planning
    • Active
    • Paused
    • Completed
    • Cancelled

Campaign Calendarâ€‹

Visual calendar view showing:

  • Campaign start/end dates
  • Scheduled activities
  • Key milestones
  • Donation deadlines

Campaign Analyticsâ€‹

Track campaign performance:

  • Progress to Goal - Visual progress bar
  • Daily/Weekly Donations - Trend charts
  • Donor Demographics - Donor type breakdown
  • Average Donation - Mean contribution amount
  • Conversion Rates - Visitor to donor ratio

Campaign Activitiesâ€‹

Activity Typesâ€‹

Schedule and track campaign-related activities:

TypeDescription
MeetingPlanning and coordination meetings
EventFundraising events
MailingDirect mail campaigns
CallPhone outreach
EmailEmail campaigns
Site VisitDonor or site visits

Activity Managementâ€‹

For each activity, track:

  • Title and description
  • Date and time
  • Location (physical or virtual)
  • Attendees
  • Status (Planned, In Progress, Completed, Cancelled)
  • Phase (Pre-Campaign, Active, Post-Campaign)
  • Notes and outcomes

Activity Calendarâ€‹

Visual scheduling with:

  • Day, week, month views
  • Color-coded by activity type
  • Drag-and-drop rescheduling
  • Conflict detection

Donation Managementâ€‹

Recording Donationsâ€‹

Capture donation details:

FieldDescription
Donor NameIndividual or organization name
Donor EmailContact email
Donor PhoneContact phone
Donor TypeIndividual, Corporate, Foundation
AmountDonation amount
DateDonation date
Payment MethodCredit Card, Check, Bank Transfer, etc.
Transaction IDPayment reference
CampaignAssociated campaign (optional)
MessageDonor message or dedication
AnonymousHide donor identity
Tax DeductibleTax-deductible status

Donation Statusâ€‹

StatusDescription
PendingAwaiting processing
CompletedSuccessfully processed
FailedTransaction failed
RefundedDonation refunded

Donation Analyticsâ€‹

Comprehensive donation insights:

  • Donations by Month - Trend analysis
  • Donations by Source - Channel performance
  • Donor Retention - Repeat donor analysis
  • Average Gift Size - Contribution patterns
  • Peak Giving Times - Optimal outreach windows

Grants Moduleâ€‹

Grantor Managementâ€‹

Maintain a database of funding organizations:

Grantor Details:

  • Organization name
  • Type (Federal, Private, Nonprofit, Corporate)
  • Focus areas
  • Contact information
  • Country
  • Status (Active, Inactive)

Grant Opportunitiesâ€‹

Track available funding opportunities:

FieldDescription
TitleOpportunity name
GrantorFunding organization
AmountAvailable funding
DeadlineApplication deadline
CategoriesEligible research areas
EligibilityRequirements and criteria
StatusOpen, Closed

Opportunity Discoveryâ€‹

  • Filter by category, amount, deadline
  • Search by grantor or keyword
  • Save favorite opportunities
  • Set deadline reminders

Grant Trackingâ€‹

For awarded grants, track:

  • Award amount
  • Grant period
  • Reporting requirements
  • Utilization status
  • Renewal dates

Financial Managementâ€‹

Central Fund Poolâ€‹

Overview of foundation finances:

  • Total available funds
  • Allocated vs. unallocated
  • Fund restrictions
  • Investment returns

Budget Managementâ€‹

  • Campaign budgets
  • Expense tracking
  • Cost per dollar raised
  • ROI analysis

Financial Reportsâ€‹

Generate financial reports:

  • Income statements
  • Donation summaries
  • Campaign profitability
  • Grant utilization
  • Annual financial reports

Donations Analytics Dashboardâ€‹

Overview Metricsâ€‹

  • Total donations (all time, YTD, MTD)
  • Number of donors
  • Average donation size
  • Donation frequency

Visualization Chartsâ€‹

  • Donations Over Time - Line chart of donation trends
  • Donations by Type - Pie chart of donor types
  • Campaigns Performance - Bar chart comparison
  • Geographic Distribution - Map of donor locations

Donor Insightsâ€‹

  • New vs. returning donors
  • Donor lifecycle analysis
  • Lapsed donor identification
  • Major donor tracking

Reporting & Exportâ€‹

Report Typesâ€‹

ReportDescription
Campaign SummaryPer-campaign performance
Donation ReportAll donations with filters
Donor ReportDonor list with giving history
Grant ReportGrant opportunities and awards
Financial SummaryOverall financial status

Export Formatsâ€‹

  • PDF for formal reports
  • Excel for data analysis
  • CSV for system integration
  • API for automation

Best Practicesâ€‹

Campaign Managementâ€‹

  1. Set realistic but motivating goals
  2. Plan activities well in advance
  3. Track progress daily during active campaigns
  4. Communicate regularly with donors
  5. Document lessons learned

Donor Relationsâ€‹

  1. Acknowledge donations promptly
  2. Provide regular impact updates
  3. Recognize major donors appropriately
  4. Maintain accurate contact information
  5. Respect donor preferences

Grant Applicationsâ€‹

  1. Monitor deadlines proactively
  2. Match opportunities to capabilities
  3. Prepare strong proposals
  4. Track submission status
  5. Follow up on pending applications
